methodology: Only includes counts verified from official government sources. Each source entry includes the URL, institution name, and date of last verification. 'known_count' is null when no official census exists for that category.

federal_leyes_vigentes.notes: Complete catalog of federal laws and codes currently in force.

state_legislativo.notes: State-level legislation from all 32 states via OJN. 782 permanent dead links (Michoacán 504, EDOMEX 141, SLP 47, others <30 each). Remaining 975 gap = 12120 - 11363 - 782 = difference likely in low-count states.

state_non_legislativo.notes: State-level regulations from executive, judicial, and autonomous bodies. Not yet scraped. These are NOT municipal laws.

municipal.notes: No authoritative census of municipal legislation exists. INEGI reports 2,468 municipalities. Only 5 tier-1 city portals have been scraped so far.

leyes_vigentes.label: Leyes Legislativas Vigentes
leyes_vigentes.description: Federal laws (Cámara de Diputados) + state laws from Poder Legislativo (OJN). This is the most comparable apples-to-apples metric.

marco_juridico_completo.label: Marco Jurídico Completo
marco_juridico_completo.description: All known legislation including state executive/judicial/autonomous body regulations. Municipal excluded due to unknown universe.
